subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Phoenix Coyotes traded center Kevyn Adams to the Chicago Blackhawks for right winger Radim Vrbata. Vrbata, 26, was Chicago’s second-leading scorer last season and set career highs in points (41) and assists (27). Adams, 32, was acquired in January from the Hurricanes and played 33 games with Phoenix.
